short_summary: Moving of furniture inventory from Employment and Social Development Canada centers to other locations.
description: The primary objective is the moving of furniture inventory from Employment and Social Development Canada centers to other locations. This includes the loading, transportation and unloading of furniture from Service Canada sites to other sites. A comprehensive list is provided for this purpose.The requested deliveries are for several different sites and the delivery dates are spread over a period from contract award to March 31, 2024. The requested delivery dates can be found in the attached annex (Delivery List).There are security requirements associated with this requirement. For additional information, consult Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses. For more information on personnel and organization security screening or security clauses, Bidders should refer to the Contract Security Program of Public Works and Government Services Canada (http:mpclipboard[translated into idiomatic English]
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title
MOVING SERVICES / SERVICES DE DÉMÉNAGEMENT

#### Tender Reference
* PW-23-01031128

#### Solicitation Number
* 100022595

#### Publication Date
* 2023-03-30

#### Tender Closing Date
* 2023-04-24T14:00:00

#### Notice Status
* Expired / Expiré

#### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: Services / SRV
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal / Demande de propositions
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner

#### Applicable Trade Agreements

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement / Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) / Accord de libre-échange Canada-Pérou (ALECP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement / Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) / Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement / Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) / Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA) / Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (ALECC)

#### Contracting Entity

* **Employment and Social Development Canada** / Emploi et Développement social Canada
* **Address:** 142 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 2K3, Canada
* **End User:** Employment and Social Development Canada
* **Contact Person:** Julie Barrette, Contracting Authority
	+ Email: julie.barrette@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca
	+ Telephone: 343-551-9889

#### Tender Description
The primary objective of this contract is the movement of furniture inventory from Employment and Social Development Canada centers to other locations. The scope of work includes the loading, transportation, and unloading of furniture from Service Canada sites to other sites. A comprehensive delivery list is provided as an annex.

Security requirements and additional requirements are outlined in Part 6 and 7 of the tender document. Bidders are advised to consult the Public Works and Government Services Canada website for further information on personnel and
